entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CertificateFailedValidation event is not logging the ChainErrors as expected. #44484
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44482
  • Update rebranding instructions to include steps for updating template precedence values #44481
    8.0-MQ
  • Perf regression: json_netty #44478
  • in Blazor wasm iframe not load the LocalStorage or IndexedDB #44468
  • RDLC work on a Linux based environment #44466
  • The synchronous method is not supported by 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.ClientHandler' #44464
  • DotNetCore API hosted via Azure App Service is stripping leading url encoded forward slash from route values. #44461

Closed

  • VS client generation causes build errors for default template #43987
  • CORS issue in .NET Core 6 API #44384
  • DateOnly and TimeOnly are displayed as complex objects in open-api schemas rather simple string #37045
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `bind:after` with asynchronous method causes multiple renders when done. #43195
    7.0.0
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix #44455
  • Curious what is the drawback of removing the reference of _framework/blazor.server.js from my blazor server project? #44444
  • Author CodeTour for Blazor navigation area #33210
    Backlog
  • ASP.NET MVC: updated model data is not recognised in view #28026
    Backlog
  • Considerable overhead in middleware pipeline #44311
  • Give the Blazor project a long name then F5 to run VS, the project name is not fully displayed on the web page. #44467
  • dotnet dev-certs https --export-path fails with UnauthorizedAccessException #44362
  • Exception Handler handling OperationCanceledException but not getting expected HTTP response #44460

PullRequests

Created

  • Update project template precedence values #44479
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Use Path.GetTempFileName() for 600 Unix file mode #44477
  • update contributing guidelines to state that Squash is preferred #44475
  • Add windows auth to path selection sample #44472
    area-security
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [3.1] Merge internal commits #44474
    3.1.x
  • [Blazor] Update bind:set,after runtime apis #44412
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #44471
    6.0.x
  • Bump NuGet.Protocol from 5.8.1 to 5.9.3 in /eng/tools/BaselineGenerator #44480
    area-infrastructure, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, .NET, 8.0-preview1
  • Update protobuf version #44450
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Merge from internal rc2 branch #44473
    tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44476
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Add VS.Redist project for ANCM #44459
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.11
  • [release/7.0] Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #44369
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Always run inline for socket callbacks #44465
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44447
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-preview1
  • Avoid double dispatch by default on HTTP.sys #44409
    Perf, area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add schema in launchSettings.json files #44295
    area-mvc
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime
  • Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44429
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2017446 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
